text: A client, client representative or any other party in a civil, criminal or administrative action, in which mental health information has been or will be disclosed, shall have the right to move the court to denominate, style or caption the names of all parties as "John Doe" or otherwise protect the anonymity of all of the parties.
historical:

DC CODE § 7-1204.05

title.text: Human Health Care and Safety. (Refs & Annos)
